item.description:
Riding high off of their two latest releases, "Keep This Love Goin', and new live cd, "We Travel The Spaceways," NRBQ is back in the saddle wowing audiences coast to coast!  Co-founder Terry Adams, the “untamed genius of the keyboards,”  remains the driving force behind the current line up. Culling from their 45+ year catalog, NRBQ will put a smile on your face and joy in your heart!

 

The Concerts start at 7:30

*Bring Chairs, Blankets, Drinks and munchies to share*

There will also be food available on site.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: NRBQ
